sect1.title: What's New For Developers
sect1.para: The GNOME 2.14 Developer's Platform provides a stable base for independant software developers to create third-party applications. GNOME and its platform are licensed to allow the creation of both free and propriortary software to run on top of GNOME.

Libraries in the GNOME Platform are guarenteed to be API and ABI stable for the rest of the GNOME 2.x release series. Libraries in GNOME Desktop do not have this guarentee, but most remain consistant from release to release.
